text: Position: Medical Appointment Scheduler. Reports to: Operations Manager. Description/Purpose of position. This position is responsible for performing various functions, including managing the flow of patient care by accurately scheduling patient appointments in the scheduling system. Have the ability to prioritize and perform work in an organized, efficient, and effective manner without constant supervision and direction. Able to adjust appropriately to the volume of work and complete tasks in a timely manner without interfering with the quality of work. Responsibilities. Coordinate appointments and reschedule as needed through EMR system. Take or respond to telephone calls and emails promptly to establish or confirm appointments. Resolve scheduling conflicts. Provide support to other team members as needed. Maintain HIPAA compliance. Demonstrate proficiency within assigned areas of responsibility. Duties may include. Guiding patients through the scheduling process. Collaborating with Nurse Practitioners if a patient needs to schedule outside their normal availability. Accurately and thoroughly schedule within the booking radius. Confirms scheduled appointments by sending confirmation to patient and nurse practitioner. Minimum Qualifications. Education: Undergraduate Degree. Experience: 2 years medical appointment scheduling preferred. Characteristics/Skills: Proficient word processing. English proficiency level C1. Detail oriented. Excellent communication skills. Interpersonal skills. Decision making skills. Other. Study abroad.

Reports to: Operations Manager

Description/Purpose of position
This position is responsible for performing various functions, including managing the flow of patient care by accurately scheduling patient appointments in the scheduling system. Have the ability to prioritize and perform work in an organized, efficient, and effective manner without constant supervision and direction. Able to adjust appropriately to the volume of work and complete tasks in a timely manner without interfering with the quality of work.

Responsibilities
Coordinate appointments and reschedule as needed through EMR system
Take or respond to telephone calls and emails promptly to establish or confirm appointments
Resolve scheduling conflicts
Provide support to other team members as needed
Maintain HIPAA compliance
Demonstrate proficiency within assigned areas of responsibility

Duties may include
Guiding patients through the scheduling process
Collaborating with Nurse Practitioners if a patient needs to schedule outside their normal availability
Accurately and thoroughly schedule within the booking radius
Confirms scheduled appointments by sending confirmation to patient and nurse practitioner

Minimum Qualifications
Education: Undergraduate Degree
Experience: 2 years medical appointment scheduling preferred
Characteristics/Skills:
Proficient word processing

Detail oriented
Excellent communication skills
